Piper Zimmerman

Piper is a 3rd year PhD candidate in the statistics department at Virginia Tech. With her advisor, Leah Johnson, she works on modeling lifetime and mortality of insects.

 

Piper Zimmerman

Piper is a 3rd year PhD candidate in the statistics department at Virginia Tech. With her advisor, Leah Johnson, she works on modeling lifetime and mortality of insects.
